Class BackboneAPI

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    API object that grants access to the MeepBackbone plugin.

    Caleb L. Power

      • dispatchRequest

        public boolean dispatchRequest​(BackboneRequest request)
        Dispatches a request to all other servers. Automatically retries failed transmissions.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        Returns:
        true if all servers received the request
        See Also:
        BackbonePlugin.dispatchRequest(BackboneRequest)

      • dispatchRequest

        public boolean dispatchRequest​(BackboneRequest request,
                               boolean retryOnFailure)
        Dispatches a request to all other servers. Allows for explicit direction as to whether a failed request should be retried.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        retryOnFailure - true to retry on transmission failure
        Returns:
        true if all servers received the request on the first try
        See Also:
        BackbonePlugin.dispatchRequest(BackboneRequest, boolean)

      • dispatchRequest

        public boolean dispatchRequest​(java.lang.String node,
                               BackboneRequest request)
        Dispatches a request to a single node/server.
        Parameters:
        node - the recipient node
        request - the request
        Returns:
        true if the server received the transmission
        See Also:
        BackbonePlugin.dispatchRequest(String, BackboneRequest)

      • dispatchRequest

        public boolean dispatchRequest​(java.lang.String node,
                               BackboneRequest request,
                               boolean retryOnFailure)
        Dispatches a request to a single node/server. Allows for explicit direction as to whether a failed request should be retried.
        Parameters:
        node - the recipient node
        request - the request
        retryOnFailure - true to retry on transmission failure
        Returns:
        true if the server received the transmission on the first try
        See Also:
        BackbonePlugin.dispatchRequest(String, BackboneRequest, boolean)

      • dispatchRequest

        public boolean dispatchRequest​(java.lang.String node,
                               BackboneRequest request,
                               RequestAckListener... ackListeners)
        Dispatches a request to a single node/server.
        Parameters:
        node - the recipient node
        request - the request
        ackListeners - additional acknowledgement listeners to attach to the payload
        Returns:
        true if the server received the transmission
        See Also:
        BackbonePlugin.dispatchRequest(String, BackboneRequest, RequestAckListener...)

      • dispatchRequest

        public boolean dispatchRequest​(java.lang.String node,
                               BackboneRequest request,
                               boolean retryOnFailure,
                               RequestAckListener... ackListeners)
        Dispatches a request to a single node/server. Allows for explicit direction as to whether a failed request should be retried.
        Parameters:
        node - the recipient node
        request - the request
        retryOnFailure - true to retry on transmission failure
        ackListeners - additional acknowledgement listeners to attach to the payload
        Returns:
        true if the server received the transmission on the first try
        See Also:
        BackbonePlugin.dispatchRequest(String, BackboneRequest, boolean, RequestAckListener...)

      • registerRequestListener

        public boolean registerRequestListener​(RequestListener requestListener)
        Registers a request listener.
        Parameters:
        requestListener - the listener
        Returns:
        true if the registration was successful
        See Also:
        BackbonePlugin.registerRequestListener(RequestListener)
